attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear sir,
i would like to suggest that alternative dispute resolution is a excellant way to deal with cases which because of human failings cast a dim light on our constitution.
whilst these cases could be adressed in law.It would detract further from the aims of those trying to aspire to the values in our constitution.
Mistakes only represent our journey toward knowledge.
It is always better to establish terms than to react to a situation and create actions that ultimately were not required.
